title: Optimal AI Restaurant Menu Scanning Demo
content: I can't believe I just found this! Optimal AI literally changed how I track my food 🤯 showing how Optimal AI helps with restaurant menu scanning
caption: I can't believe I just found this! Optimal AI literally changed how I track my food 🤯 #OptimalAI #CalorieTracking #fitness_enthusiasts

scenes.text: I can't believe I just found this! Optimal AI literally changed how I track my food 🤯
